instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.description: What the agent should do when this plan executes. Be specific and actionable so a headless agent can execute independently.

context.title: Context
context.description: JSON object with context variables like record IDs or parameters. e.g. {"AccountId":"001xx","Priority":"High"}

cronExpression.title: Cron Expression
cronExpression.description: Salesforce cron expression for when to execute. Format: seconds minutes hours dayOfMonth month dayOfWeek optionalYear. e.g. 0 0 9 ? * MON-FRI for weekdays at 9am.

isRecurring.title: Is Recurring
isRecurring.description: Set to true for repeating schedules (daily, weekly, monthly). Set to false for one-time execution.
